title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional
overview: Advanced certification demonstrating expertise in designing distributed systems on AWS.

details.description: Comprehensive exam covering advanced architecture patterns, security, cost optimization, migration strategies, and operational excellence on AWS. Validates ability to design and deploy dynamically scalable, highly available, fault-tolerant, and reliable applications.

title: Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA)
overview: Hands-on certification validating skills in Kubernetes cluster administration and troubleshooting.

details.description: Performance-based exam testing ability to perform tasks in cluster architecture, installation, configuration, networking, storage, security, and troubleshooting. Demonstrates proficiency in managing production-grade Kubernetes environments.

title: Machine Learning Specialization
overview: Comprehensive specialization covering supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and deep learning fundamentals.

details.description: Three-course specialization taught by Andrew Ng covering regression, classification, neural networks, decision trees, recommender systems, and best practices for ML development. Includes hands-on projects implementing algorithms from scratch.

title: Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp
overview: Intensive 9-week bootcamp covering full-stack development with Ruby on Rails and JavaScript.

details.description: Intensive program covering web development fundamentals, Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, React, databases, deployment, and agile methodologies. Built 3 full-stack applications including a final project deployed to production.

title: Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect
overview: Currently preparing for GCP architect certification to expand multi-cloud expertise.

details.description: Studying cloud architecture patterns, GCP services, migration strategies, and cost optimization. Planning to take exam in Q1 2024.
